data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Cuscatlán. Through your servants plant 50 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cuscatlán, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Cuscatlán, El Salvador.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Cuscatlán, El Salvador to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Cuscatlán unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Father, I pray that the Turk people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Turk people know you.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 252,500 people living in the state of Cuscatlán.
Spirit, teach the 113,464 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cuscatlán, El Salvador has a population of 252,500.

We estimate Cuscatlán has 113,464 people who might know Jesus, 125,034 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 14,002 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Cuscatlán, El Salvador into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
